title: fix Android and Tizen Location error #581
body: Fixed OnTouch e.Location error if `IgnorePixelScaling = true;` in Android and Tizen

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body: ### :x: Validation status: errors File | Status | Preview URL | Details ---- | ------ | ----------- | ------- []() | :x:Error | | [Details](#user-content-) ### []() - **[Error]** File:../externals/skia not existed. - **[Error]** Some error ocurred while parsing changelist file: W:\wk03-log-bb861770\change-list-with-redirection.mapped.tsv. For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2018%5C7%5C24%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201807240248446163-589%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=rEygORAv8QdJs3V0xsPq4HxNV%2Bno7BcaEIWAgg9NLWw%3D&st=2018-07-24T02%3A45%3A25Z&se=2018-08-24T02%3A50%3A25Z&sp=r). **Note:** If you changed an existing file name or deleted a file, broken links in other files to the deleted or renamed file are listed only in the full build report.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for the PR. As soon as the build completes, I'll merge.
